DOC.brief_summary: This large , community-based , cluster-randomized trial compare routine prophylactic use 600 mcg oral misoprostol 10 IU oxytocin deliver UnijectTM intramuscularly third stage labor .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Misoprostol Oxytocin UnijectTM Postpartum Hemorrhage ( PPH ) Prevention Mali
DOC.detailed_description: This study assess programmatic implication ( include feasibility , acceptability , cost , risk benefit ) community level introduction misoprostol and/or oxytocin UnijectTM prevention PPH help identify appropriate niche drug .
